summary: Adds 6 Expert level Bound Weapons and associated spell tomes.
descriptionHtml:
I found that at higher levels, even my enhanced bound weapons don\'t stack up against master crafted adn enchanted ones sooo...

Adds 6 Expert level Bound Weapons and associated spell tomes.

Spells are purchased from the usual Conjuration sellers. Details below:

Spectral Weapon - Air
One-handed sword, enchanted with shock damage, absorb magika and chance to cause knockdown. Adds an enhanced Lightning Cloak to the user while equiped.

Spectral Weapon - Fire
Two-handed sword, enchanted with fire damage, absorb health and Banish. Adds an enhanced Flame Cloak to the user while equiped.

Spectral Weapon - Water
One-handed mace, enchanted with frost damage, slow and chance to paralyze. Adds an enhanced Frost Cloak to the user while equiped.

Spectral Weapon - Earth
Two-handed staff (weapon not casting staff), enchanted with poison damage, absorb stamina and chance to paralyze. Adds an enhanced Poison Cloak to the user while equiped.

Spectral Weapon - Spirit
One-handed dagger, enchanted with soul trap, slow, absorb health, stamina and magika. Adds Spectral Form (50% damage resistance and muffle) to the user while equiped.

Spectral Weapon - Life
One-handed axe, enchanted with absorb health, stamina damage, fear and chance to paralyze. Adds Blood Cloak (40% weakening of enemy armour and damage) to the user while equiped.

*** Updates ***
v1.1 - fixed a bug that prevented the weapons summoning correctly if you had just the wrong combination of perks. Also tweeked the stats of the weapons themselves to better match fully tempered weapons.
v1.2 - 5th weapon added. Minor bug fixes
v1.3 - 6th weapon added. Changed hand effects for all weapons to better fit the element
